CustomField.description:
Indicates if the Moment should be checked as MQL eligible.
In System Use: 'Autolaunch: Check MQL', 'Contact - After Save Automations', 'Campaign Member: After Save Automations', 'Koala Intent Signal - After Save Automations', 'Moment: After Save Automations', 'Retool User - After Save Automations', 'Task - After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: Koala
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Moment should be checked as MQL eligible.
CustomField.label: Check MQL
